references.reason: This paper introduces recursive program synthesis, a foundational technique for program synthesis that is directly relevant to the hybrid approach proposed in the current paper.
This paper introduces syntax-guided synthesis, a powerful program synthesis technique that is used as the basis for the bottom-up synthesizer in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Scaling enumerative program synthesis via divide and conquer
references.reason: This paper presents a divide-and-conquer approach to enumerative program synthesis, which is highly relevant to the efficient search strategy employed in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Just-in-time learning for bottom-up enumerative synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces a just-in-time learning approach to bottom-up enumerative synthesis, which is directly related to the hybrid approach proposed in the current paper.
This paper introduces DeepCoder, a neural-guided program synthesis approach that is highly relevant to the hybrid approach proposed in the current paper.
